reviews.review:
Review from someone playing shooting games competatively for years.... 
Overall good game play, but sharp learning curve for recoil control, map learning, and utilities. Needs a good 100 hours or so to become good at the game, but worth it for pretty smooth game play. Only little bugs here and there, and occasional cheaters, but all in all recommended.
